title: Dez Bryant, Saints, Patriots, Le'Veon Bell, and the Cowboys
itunes:title: Dez Bryant, Saints, Patriots, Le'Veon Bell, and the Cowboys
description:
Colin discusses the New Orleans Saints signing FA WR Dez Bryant, and why he should thank Patriots WR Josh Gordon, more on the Le'Veon Bell situation, and the Dallas Cowboys' dysfunction. Guests include Hue Jackson, Joel Klatt, and T. J. Houshmandzadeh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
